version_description:
Update 9.0 - Now Live!

New Game Mode - Hawkins National Lab
Experience an exciting new game mode! Battle through the levels in the basement of Hawkins National Lab and see how far your team can go!

Collect Equipment!
Supercharge your characters with radical new items.

New Chapter!
An afternoon of role playing games turns out to be anything but ordinary. Can your team HATCH a plan to save Hawkins?

UI Improvements!
You asked, we listened - we've made character rarity easier to understand and implemented several changes to text and other UI elements to create a more enjoyable playing experience!

Minor bug fixes
Our exterminators has been hard at work getting rid of pesky bugs!

Update 9.0.1 - Now Live!



New Game Mode - Hawkins National Lab
Experience an exciting new game mode! Battle through the levels in the basement of Hawkins National Lab and see how far your team can go!


Collect Equipment!
Supercharge your characters with radical new items.


New Chapter!
An afternoon of role playing games turns out to be anything but ordinary. Can your team HATCH a plan to save Hawkins?


UI Improvements!
You asked, we listened - we've made character rarity easier to understand and implemented several changes to text and other UI elements to create a more enjoyable playing experience!


Bug fixes
Fixes an issue affecting performance for players that have progressed further into the game.

11.0 - The Upside Down Update!

New Chapters
Dive head-first into new battles in the Upside Down and Hawkins Hospital in two NEW story chapters!

Calling All Characters!
Calling new characters to your team with diamonds and walkie-talkies has been made easier and more fun than ever!

UI Improvements
We've made significant improvements to the game's UI, including making the settings menu easier to access.
